entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 01:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:21 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:21 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:21 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
